msg: While walking down the path an old man walks up to you. He is obviously homeless, but appears to mean no harm.
While walking the path, you feel a tap on your shoulder. Turning around you see what appears to be a homeless man looking up to you.

eventDo: You turn to him and ask him what he wants.

You want nothing to do with a man that looks like that.
You continue walking and pretend you never saw him.
